name: Sticky Justice
description:
Theme: STICKY JUSTICE

As you can all see, this is a very rough build, I had things to do the weekend of the jam, so I wasn't able to get everything in that I wanted to. experience. This was my first game jam, a brilliant learning experience.

Hopefully when you see this page, you'll be able to see the huge difference in quality from the first video to the version you see now.

Created in: GameMaker Studio 2

Music created by Chris Bell: https://soundcloud.com/crbellmusic
